1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1 1e1s1 1u1n1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1u1b1i1c1a1d1a1 1e1n1 1e1l1 1s1u1d1e1s1t1e1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1p1r1o1v1i1n1c1i1a1 1d1e1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1,1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1,1 1s1o1b1r1e1 1l1a1 1c1o1s1t1a1 1d1e1l1 1m1a1r1 1a1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1o1.1 1E1s1 1l1a1 1c1a1b1e1c1e1r1a1 1d1e1l1 1p1a1r1t1i1d1o1 1d1e1 1G1e1n1e1r1a1l1 1P1u1e1y2r1e1d1ó1n1,1 1u1n1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1e1 1p1u1e1r1t1o1 1y1 1b1a1l1n1e1a1r1i1o1 1y1 1l1a1 1s1e1g1u1n1d1a1 1u1r1b1e1 1d1e1 1t1u1r1i1s1m1o1 1m1á1s1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1e1 1d1e1l1 1p1a1í1s1 1t1r1a1s1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1,1 1y1a1 1q1u1e1 1e1n1 1é1p1o1c1a1 1d1e1 1v1e1r1a1n1o1 1s1u1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1ó1n1 1p1u1e1d1e1 1a1u1m1e1n1t1a1r1 1e1n1 1a1l1r1e1d1e1d1o1r1 1d1e1 1u1n1 13201 1%1,1 1p1o1r1 1l1o1 1q1u1e1 1c1u1e1n1t1a1 1c1o1n1 1u1n1a1 1g1r1a1n1 1o1f1e1r1t1a1 1d1e1 1i1n1f1r1a1e1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1a1 1d1e1 1h1o1t1e1l1e1s1.1 1L1a1 1a1u1t1o1v1í1a1 121 1l1a1 1e1n1l1a1z1a1 1t1r1a1s1 1410141 1k1m1 1c1o1n1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1 1y1 1e1s1t1á1 1u1b1i1c1a1d1a1 1a1 1316151 1k1m1 1d1e1 1L1a1 1P1l1a1t1a1.2
1F1u1e1 1f1u1n1d1a1d1a1 1c1o1n1 1s1u1 1n1o1m1b1r1e1 1a1c1t1u1a1l1 1e1l1 11101 1d1e1 1f1e1b1r1e1r1o1 1d1e1 111817141 1p1o1r1 1P1a1t1r1i1c1i1o1 1P1e1r1a1l1t1a1 1R1a1m1o1s1,1 1e1n1 1u1n1a1 1e1s1t1a1n1c1i1a1 1d1e1 1s1u1 1p1r1o1p1i1e1d1a1d1,1 1s1o1b1r1e1 1l1a1 1b1a1s1e1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1s1e1g1u1n1d1a1 1d1e1 1l1a1s1 1t1r1e1s1 1e1x1t1i1n1t1a1s1 1m1i1s1i1o1n1e1s1 1j1e1s1u1i1t1a1s1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1P1a1m1p1a1,1 1f1u1n1d1a1d1a1s1 1e1n1 1l1a1 1s1e1g1u1n1d1a1 1m1i1t1a1d1 1d1e1l1 1s1i1g1l1o1 1X1V3I1,1 1d1e1n1o1m1i1n1a1d1a1 1N1u1e1s1t1r1a1 1S1e1ñ1o1r1a1 1d1e1l1 1P1i1l1a1r1 1d1e1 1P1u1e1l1c1h1e1s1,1 1q1u1e1 1m1á1s1 1t1a1r1d1e1 1r1e1c1i1b1i1ó1 1e1l1 1n1o1m1b1r1e1 1d1e1 1«1P1u1e1r1t1o1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1L1a1g1u1n1a1 1d1e1 1l1o1s1 1P1a1d1r1e1s1»1.2
1L1a1s1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1l1e1s1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1i1a1s1 1s1o1n1 1l1a1 1p1e1s1q1u1e1r1a1,1 1l1a1 1t1u1r1í1s1t1i1c1a1 1y1 1l1a1 1t1e1x1t1i1l1.1 1L1a1 1p1e1s1c1a1,1 1a1c1t1i1v1i1d1a1d1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1l1 1d1e1l1 1p1u1e1r1t1o1,1 1s1e1 1c1o1m1p1l1e1m1e1n1t1a1 1t1a1m1b1i1é1n1 1c1o1n1 1b1a1r1c1o1s1 1p1e1t1r1o1l1e1r1o1s1 1y1 1c1e1r1e1a1l1e1r1o1s1.1 1L1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1c1u1e1n1t1a1 1t1a1m1b1i1é1n1 1c1o1n1 1u1n1a1 1b1a1s1e1 1n1a1v1a1l1 1d1e1 1s1u1b1m1a1r1i1n1o1s1.1 1E1n1t1r1e1 1l1a1 1g1r1a1n1 1v1a1r1i1e1d1a1d1 1d1e1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1i1a1s1,1 1s1e1 1d1e1s1t1a1c1a1n1 1t1a1m1b1i1é1n1 1l1a1s1 1d1e1r1i1v1a1d1a1s1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1h1o1r1t1i1c1u1l1t1u1r1a1,1 1l1a1 1c1o1n1s1t1r1u2c1i1ó1n1,1 1l1a1 1m1e1t1a1l1ú1r1g1i1c1a1 1y1 1l1a1 1m1e1c1á1n1i1c1a1.2

1D1e1s1d1e1 1s1u1s1 1i1n1i1c1i1o1s1,1 1l1a1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1ó1n1 1m1a1r1p1l1a1t1e1n1s1e1 1s1e1 1c1a1r1a1c1t1e1r1i1z1ó1 1p1o1r1 1u1n1a1 1f1u1e1r1t1e1 1i1n1f1l1u1e1n1c1i1a1 1d1e1 1l1a1s1 1m1i1g1r1a1c1i1o1n1e1s1 1i1n1t1e1r1n1a1s1 1y1 1e1x1t1e1r1n1a1s1.1 1A1s1í1 1e1n1 111819151 1e1l1 14101 1%1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1ó1n1 1d1e1l1 1P1a1r1t1i1d1o1 1e1r1a1 1e1x1t1r1a1n1j1e1r1a1,1 1p1r1e1d1o1m1i1n1a1n1t1e1m1e1n1t1e1 1d1e1 1o1r1i1g1e1n1 1i1t1a1l1i1a1n1o1 1y1 1e1s1p1a1ñ1o1l1.1 1Y1a1 1d1e1s1d1e1 1e1s1a1 1é1p1o1c1a1,1 1c1o1m1e1n1z1ó1 1a1 1n1o1t1a1r1s1e1 1u1n1 1i1n1c1r1e1m1e1n1t1o1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1e1n1 1v1e1r1a1n1o1,1 1n1o1 1s1o1l1o1 1d1e1 1v1e1r1a1n1e1a1n1t1e1s1 1s1i1n1o1 1d1e1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1ó1n1 1c1o1n1 1i1n1t1e1n1c1i1o1n1e1s1 1d1e1 1a1s1e1n1t1a1r1s1e1 1e1n1 1l1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1.2

1L1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1d1e1 1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1 1c1o1m1o1 1c1u1a1l1q1u1i1e1r1 1o1t1r1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1t1u1r1í1s1t1i1c1a1 1d1e1l1 1m1u1n1d1o1,1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1a1 1u1n1a1 1n1o1t1a1b1l1e1 1v1a1r1i1a1c1i1ó1n1 1e1n1t1r1e1 1l1a1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1ó1n1 1e1s1t1a1b1l1e1,1 1y1 1l1a1 1e1s1t1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1.1 1D1e1b1i1d1o1 1a1l1 1i1n1c1r1e1m1e1n1t1o1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1s1e1 1h1a1c1e1 1n1e1c1e1s1a1r1i1o1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1r1 1u1n1a1 1m1a1y1o1r1 1o1f1e1r1t1a1 1d1e1 1b1i1e1n1e1s1 1y1 1s1e1r1v1i1c1i1o1s1 1e1n1 1l1o1s1 1p1e1r1í1o1d1o1s1 1d1e1 1v1a1c1a1c1i1o1n1e1s1 1o1 1f1i1n1e1s1 1d1e1 1s1e1m1a1n1a1 1l1a1r1g1o1s1.2

1L1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1d1e1 1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1,1 1e1s1 1c1a1b1e1c1e1r1a1 1d1e1l1 1p1a1r1t1i1d1o1 1d1e1 1G1e1n1e1r1a1l1 1P1u1e1y2r1e1d1ó1n1.1 1E1l1 1m1i1s1m1o1 1t1i1e1n1e1 1u1n1a1 1s1u1p1e1r1f1i1c1i1e1 1d1e1 111.1415131,241 1k1i1l1ó1m1e1t1r1o1s1 1c1u1a1d1r1a1d1o1s1,1 1d1e1 1l1o1s1 1c1u1a1l1e1s1 1e1l1 1t1e1j1i1d1o1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1,1 1o1c1u1p1a1 17191,14181 1k1i1l1ó1m1e1t1r1o1s1 1c1u1a1d1r1a1d1o1s1.1 1S1u1 1u1b1i1c1a1c1i1ó1n1 1e1n1 1r1e1l1a1c1i1ó1n1 1c1o1n1 1l1a1s1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1l1e1s1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1e1s1 1d1e1 1l1o1s1 1d1i1s1t1i1n1t1o1s1 1p1a1í1s1e1s1 1d1e1l1 1M1e1r1c1o1s1u1r1,1 1p1e1r1m1i1t1e1 1d1e1t1e1r1m1i1n1a1r1 1q1u1e1 1p1o1t1e1n1c1i1a1l1m1e1n1t1e1 1e1s1 1u1n1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1d1e1 1n1e1g1o1c1i1o1s1 1y1 1t1r1á1f1i1c1o1 1i1n1t1e1r1n1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1t1a1n1t1o1 1p1o1r1 1l1o1s1 1m1e1d1i1o1s1 1t1e2r1e1s1t1r1e1s1,1 1m1a1r1í1t1i1m1o1s1 1c1o1m1o1 1a1é1r1e1o1s1.1 1S1u1 1r1e1l1a1t1i1v1a1m1e1n1t1e1 1c1o1r1t1a1 1d1i1s1t1a1n1c1i1a1 1a1 1l1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1d1e1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1 1y1 1e1l1 1G1r1a1n1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1,1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1l1 1c1e1n1t1r1o1 1p1o1b1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1d1e1 1c1o1n1s1u1m1o1 1y1 1p1r1o1d1u2c1i1ó1n1,1 1h1a1c1e1 1d1e1 1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1 1u1n1 1p1o1l1o1 1d1e1 1c1r1e1c1i1m1i1e1n1t1o1 1d1e1 1p1o1t1e1n1c1i1a1l1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1c1i1a1 1p1a1r1a1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1.2
1L1a1 1h1i1s1t1o1r1i1a1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1í1a1 1m1a1r1p1l1a1t1e1n1s1e1 1r1e1f1l1e1j1a1 1u1n1 1d1i1n1a1m1i1s1m1o1 1p1r1o1p1i1o1,1 1d1e1b1i1d1o1 1a1 1s1u1 1c1a1r1a1c1t1e1r1í1s1t1i1c1a1 1d1e1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1b1a1l1n1e1a1r1i1a1 1e1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1i1a1l1,1 1d1i1n1a1m1i1s1m1o1 1q1u1e1 1e1n1 1c1i1e1r1t1a1 1m1e1d1i1d1a1 1e1s1 1m1o1t1o1r1i1z1a1d1o1 1a1 1l1o1 1l1a1r1g1o1 1d1e1l1 1t1i1e1m1p1o1 1p1o1r1 1l1a1s1 1d1i1s1t1i1n1t1a1s1 1c1o1y1u1n1t1u1r1a1s1 1n1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1e1s1.1 1D1o1s1 1m1o1m1e1n1t1o1s1 1d1i1f1e1r1e1n1t1e1s1 1s1i1r1v1e1n1 1d1e1 1e1j1e1m1p1l1o1 1a1 1l1o1 1d1i1c1h1o1,1 1l1a1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1 1m1o1d1e1l1o1 1a1g1r1o1e1x1p1o1r1t1a1d1o1r1 1d1e1 1f1i1n1e1s1 1d1e1l1 1s1i1g1l1o1 1X1I1X1,1 1p1r1o1v1o1c1ó1 1c1a1m1b1i1o1s1 1e1n1 1l1a1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1í1a1 1r1e1g1i1o1n1a1l1,1 1y1a1 1q1u1e1 1é1s1t1a1 1n1o1 1s1o1l1o1 1s1e1 1v1i1o1 1f1a1v1o1r1e1c1i1d1a1 1p1o1r1 1s1u1s1 1r1i1q1u1e1z1a1s1 1g1a1n1a1d1e1r1a1s1,1 1s1i1n1o1 1q1u1e1 1a1 1l1a1 1p1a1r1 1s1u1r1g1i1ó1 1u1n1a1 1c1i1u1d1a1d1 1b1a1l1n1e1a1r1i1a1 1d1e1s1t1i1n1a1d1a1 1a1 1p1e1r1d1u1r1a1r1 1y1 1a1 1t1r1a1n1s1f1o1r1m1a1r1 1e1l1 1e1j1e1 1r1u1r1a1l1 1q1u1e1 1h1a1s1t1a1 1e1n1t1o1n1c1e1s1 1f1u1e1 1l1o1 1c1o1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1i1v1o1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1í1a1.2
1A1 1f1i1n1e1s1 1d1e1l1 1s1i1g1l1o1 1X1I1X1,1 1s1e1 1c1o1n1f1o1r1m1ó1 1u1n1 1e1j1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1o1-1t1u1r1í1s1t1i1c1o1-1c1o1m1e1r1c1i1a1l1.1 1O1t1r1o1 1h1e1c1h1o1 1d1e1 1í1n1d1o1l1e1 1n1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1q1u1e1 1t1r1a1j1o1 1c1a1m1b1i1o1s1 1e1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1a1l1e1s1,1 1e1s1 1e1l1 1p1r1o1c1e1s1o1 1q1u1e1 1s1e1 1i1n1i1c1i1ó1 1e1n1 1l1a1 1d1é1c1a1d1a1 1d1e1 111913101 1y1 1c1u1l1m1i1n1ó1 1c1o1n1 1e1l1 1a1d1v1e1n1i1m1i1e1n1t1o1 1d1e1l1 1p1e1r1o1n1i1s1m1o1 1e1n1 1l1a1 1d1é1c1a1d1a1 1d1e1 111914101.
